# Strata Developer Documentation

> Documentation for data engineers building semantic models with Strata CLI

Strata is a semantic layer platform that transforms raw database tables into business-ready analytics models. This documentation covers the Strata CLI used by data engineers to define semantic models using YAML files.

## Getting Started
- [What is Strata](/getting-started): Overview and concepts
- [Installation](/getting-started/installation): Install Strata CLI
- [Quickstart](/getting-started/quickstart): Create first model in 5 minutes
- [Core Concepts](/getting-started/concepts): Understanding the semantic layer

## Guides
- [Creating Tables](/guides/creating-tables): Define semantic tables
- [Fields and Types](/guides/fields-and-types): Dimensions, measures, data types
- [Expressions](/guides/expressions): SQL expressions, lookups, primary keys
- [Relationships](/guides/relationships): Configure joins between tables
- [Datasources](/semantic-model/datasources): Configure database connections and tiers
- [Migrations](/guides/migrations): Rename and swap operations
- [Testing](/cli/tests): Validate your semantic model
- [Deployment](/guides/deployment): Deploy to Strata server
- [CI/CD](/cli/ci-cd): Automated deployment workflows

## Semantic Model
- [Semantic Model Overview](/semantic-model): Deep dive into model capabilities
- [Tables](/semantic-model/tables): Table model reference
- [Dimensions](/semantic-model/fields/dimensions): Dimension fields
- [Measures](/semantic-model/fields/measures): Measure fields
- [Data Types](/semantic-model/fields/data-types): Supported data types
- [SQL Expressions](/semantic-model/expressions/sql): SQL expression syntax
- [Relationships](/semantic-model/relationships/cardinality): Join cardinality

## Advanced Features
- [Snapshot Measures](/semantic-model/fields/measures/snapshot): Beginning/ending snapshots
- [Exclusions](/advanced/exclusions): Measure exclusions
- [Inclusions](/advanced/inclusions): Multi-level calculations
- [Partitions](/advanced/partitions): Date partitioning
- [Cost Optimization](/advanced/cost-optimization): Table cost and tier routing
- [Temporal Decorators](/advanced/decorators/temporal): YoY, MoM comparisons
- [Window Decorators](/advanced/decorators/window): Moving averages, ranking
- [Multi-Datasource](/advanced/multi-datasource): Cross-datasource queries

## Reference
- [CLI Commands](/cli): Complete command reference
- [Tables](/semantic-model/tables) and [Relationships](/semantic-model/relationships/cardinality): Model structure
- [Adapters](/cli/adapters): Database adapter configurations

## Examples
- [TPC-DS Tutorial](/examples/tpcds-tutorial): Full walkthrough
- [Star Schema](/examples/patterns/star-schema): Star schema modeling
- [Customer 360](/examples/recipes/customer-360): Customer analytics recipe

## API
- [JSON Schema](/api/json-schema): Machine-readable schema definitions
- [OpenAPI](/api/openapi): REST API reference
